reviews.review: Ну вот как вам сказать. Игра конечно говно полное, денег своих не стоит. Ну вот если купить в 2014 году за 2 доллара, то пойдет. Одним словом, сплошные дауны тут играют
good game, shame its full of hackers

Esse jogo é tipo uma droga pois o drogado sabe que faz mal e continua fazendo e assim como um drogado eu só jogo porque sou viciado, mas, é um jogo cheio de hack e a gente sempre passa raiva! Se quer um conselho, não seja mais um de mim!!! NÃO COMPRE!
this game is not what it used to be, too many hackers and too many 7 year olds kicking you for no reason... it;s a shame.
Nakoľko je tu veľa cheaterov, tak tá hra nie je to ćo si človek kúpil
Tirando os cheaters e os chorões é um otimo jogo para passar tempo com 5 amigos ;)
A very tactical and skill based teamwork shooter. Everyone can find a gun that they like so I don't know why you wouldn't play :)
Makes me want to die every time I play 10/10
Oyunda hile koruması olmadığı için 70 tl verenlerin hakkına giriyosunuz
Half the time it makes you want to kill yourself but the other half of the time its fun.
nie trafiam wgl a oni mnie zabijają nie wiem nie podoba mi sie wole w lola grac chyba jednak nie wiem albo brawlhalle ale vertigo jest spoko
det er et godt spil du skal bare øve dig og spil nogen timer så bliver man god til CS:GO
wenn das trust factor sstem net so schmutz wer wäre das game 10 von10
fena değil hile çok ama ona göre
Спасибо вольво за лп. Каждую игру попадаются читеры ебаные

Played a little bit of this game, it's okay I guess.


Actually though, Competitive Valve Match-Making is utter garbage. Do not play the Valve MM, use Faceit (you can google it). Valve MM is filled with smurfs, cheaters, and griefers... Even with high trust factor and Prime.





Other than Valve Match-Making, the game is pretty solid and really addictive if you like competitive tactical-shooters.







Fuck CS:GO, it's amazing and makes me want to tie my scrotum to a roof and jump off a building. Really fun
There are a lot of terrorists.
I would recommend this game. Its fun

Ganz starke Leistung die BOTS im MM zu entfernen, wenn jemand quittet! 
Super Valve 👍🏼 (nicht)
Highly Recommend CSGO, really fun if you want to play a few quick games or if you want to make a team and play competitive with friends. Also one of the best skins of all games.
Não aguento mais passar raiva com essa porra

kanser olmak ıstıyorsnaı oynayın cunkü steam destek bakmıyor bile hilelere  maçları takmıyorlar reportlamaları küfürleri hiç birşeyii hile acıp keyif alanlarda zaten belli model insanlara onlara hitap etmemesi lazım bu cs go nun yazık yanı emeklerımıze zamanımıza ayıptır....
This game is poggers if you want free Russian lessons and become an extremely racist man
The game itself is kinda fun but....the players
